Reviews.Content: A great value for your money!! This Hotel was opened a Month ago. Its a clean Hotel that offers a double room for 38 Euro a night! and children under 12 are FREE in the room of the parents.The Hotel includes free coffe  tea, a plasma in the room and free parking.The breakfast is cheep (4 Euro) but not worthwhile.So if you are on the way from or to Barcelona its THE place to stay
Reviews.Author: vdany
